description: Assigns the incoming byte stream and converts the assigned bits to the defined type.

properties.name: input_bits
properties.label: Length of input bits
properties.description: Provides the length of the incoming bit stream.

properties.name: properties
properties.label: Bit Properties
properties.description: Specify the properties that the parsed bits should be stored in.

name.label: Result Property Names
name.description: Provide the resulting property names that are set in the message with the extracted and converted values.

bit_length.label: Length in Bits
bit_length.description: Provides the length of the property in bits.
